text.section: Any person who wrongfully causes or conspires with or assists another in causing the unwarranted determination of disability or partial disability of any individual under KRS 387.500 to 387.770 or the denial of any individual of any rights accorded to him under the provisions of KRS 387.500 to 387.770 shall be guilty of a Class A misdemeanor.
Any person who intentionally violates the confidentiality of any records or reports under KRS 387.500 to 387.770 shall be guilty of a Class B misdemeanor.

law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 29, effective July 1, 1982.
